original_text: and see what the land is, and whether the people who dwell in it are strong or weak, whether they are few or many,
korean_text: 그 땅이 어떠한지 정탐하라 곧 그 땅 거민이 강한지 약한지 많은지 적은지와

sentences.original_text: and see what the land is
and whether the people who dwell in it are strong or weak
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅에 거주하는 백성이 강한지 약한지

sentences.original_text: whether they are few or many
